content: Acute Kidney Injury (AKI) KDIGO Staging: Stage 1 = creatinine 1.5-1.9x baseline OR increase ≥0.3 mg/dL OR urine output <0.5 mL/kg/h for 6-12h. Stage 2 = creatinine 2.0-2.9x baseline OR urine output <0.5 mL/kg/h for ≥12h. Stage 3 = creatinine ≥3.0x baseline OR increase to ≥4.0 mg/dL OR urine output <0.3 mL/kg/h for ≥24h OR anuria for ≥12h OR initiation of renal replacement therapy. Common causes: prerenal (hypovolemia, hypotension), intrinsic renal (ATN, glomerulonephritis), postrenal (obstruction).
name: AKI KDIGO Staging Criteria
